content: this little christmas gnome is the day 10 pattern in the mini amigurumi advent it is about 5 tall sitting made with worsted weight yarn and a g hook sample used loops and threads impeccable and red heart super saver the mini amigurumi advent includes 24 amigurumi patterns for christmas ranging from 3 -6 tall the gnome is available free on my blog as part of the mini amigurumi advent or available for purchase in the mini amigurumi advent ebook which contains all 24 patterns
